entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
